metadata:
========
Series: DT.TDS.DPPG.GN.ZS

Aggregationmethod: Weighted average
--------
IndicatorName: Public and publicly guaranteed debt service (% of GNI)
--------
License_Type: CC BY-4.0
--------
License_URL: https://datacatalog.worldbank.org/public-licenses#cc-by
--------
Longdefinition: Public and publicly guaranteed debt service is the sum of principal repayments and interest actually paid in currency, goods, or services on long-term obligations of public debtors and long-term private obligations guaranteed by a public entity.
--------
Periodicity: Annual
--------
Source: World Bank, International Debt Statistics.
--------
Topic: Economic Policy & Debt: External debt: Debt ratios & other items
description: Public and publicly guaranteed debt service (% of GNI)
